text: __NOTOC__ Year 173 (CLXXIII) was a common year starting on Thursday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Gnaeus Claudius Severus and Tiberius Claudius Pompeianus become Roman Consuls. * June 11 - Emperor Marcus Aurelius begins a battle against the Quadi. * Avidius Cassius, the governor of Syria, stops shepherds known as the boukoloi. == Births == * Maximinus Thrax, Roman emperor (d. 238) * Mi Heng (d. 200) * Sun Ben, nephew of Sun Jian (d. 209) * Yuan Tan, eldest son of Yuan Shao (d. 205) == Deaths == *
